recipesJson.name: Pineapple Mango
recipesJson.author: Letsmix
recipesJson.description: Just a quick recipe I threw together. I was very surprised and have been vaping it non stop!

reviews.text: Great balanced mix. The Mango is an undertone, allowing the pineapple to shine. The creams make it very smooth and easy to vape. Needs IMHO 5-7 days to let the vanilla settle.
This is really good.  To me, it's something between a tropical gum and something I want to add rum to and drink on the beach.
